name: bridgit-ai
description: A production-grade, real-time speech pipeline orchestrating ElevenLabs APIs for both high-accuracy speech-to-text (STT) and human-sounding text-to-speech (TTS), DeepL for fast, robust translation, and Ably for ultra-low-latency pub/sub messaging. Built for next-generation multilingual conversationsâ€”secure, scalable, and designed to power seamless voice translation, solo mode, and broadcast playback workflows with direct-to-client delivery.
author: Avi Kay - Bridgit-AI
